sentences.english: The Hyatt hotel chain plans to turn 44 floors into a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 凱悅酒店則計劃把其中的44層建成一座五星級酒店。

sentences.english: Performs routine duties in the cleaning and servicing of guest rooms ensuring the cleanliness meet Hyatt Brand Standards.
sentences.chinese: 每日對客房的清潔和服務都達到凱悅品牌的標準。

sentences.english: Take us to the Hyatt on Sunset, please.
sentences.chinese: 請載我們到日落大道的凱悅飯店。

sentences.english: Mary is in the lobby of Grand Hyatt Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗現在在凱悅飯店大廳。

sentences.english: Please take me to Hyatt Regency Hotel.
I'm actually going to go get dinner at the Hyatt  in a couple hours.
sentences.chinese: 我要去那邊的凱悅酒店喫晚餐，大約兩個小時。

definition: hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
to eat one's fill/to be full

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2
